_I was told to never ever buy champions with RP. I have been doing so tho. It gets them quicker, that is, if you have the money. However, I'm sitting at more IP than I can imagine, and I don't know what champion to get. But hey, if you have the money to buy the champion with RP, go ahead. It's what keeps LoL up and running and from going out of business._
